home.name: I am Victor Mazzola
home.text: Always seeking to enhance my understanding of development to deliver innovative solutions for everyone

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: Showcasing my projects and skills using React, TypeScript, Tailwind, and Vite.
portfolio.modalContent: This portfolio showcases my growth as a developer. My first portfolio was built using HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap, but this new version applies my knowledge of React, TypeScript, Tailwind, and Vite.

calculator.title: Calculator
calculator.description: A modern calculator app built with React and Vite, featuring offline functionality through PWA support. Responsive, fast, and easy to use.
calculator.modalContent: Calculator made using React and Vite. It features basic calculator operations for everyday needs, Progressive Web App (PWA) functionality for offline use and installation, and a responsive design for seamless use across devices. Powered by React for a modular UI and Vite for blazing-fast performance

shopping-list.title: Shopping List
shopping-list.description: Manage shopping items dynamically using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and SweetAlert2.
shopping-list.modalContent: Shopping List simplifies shopping management. Add, edit, delete, and mark items as purchased, with creation dates displayed. Built with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and SweetAlert2, it's responsive and user-friendly.

teamflow.title: TeamFlow
teamflow.description: A React app with reusable components, state management, and responsive design. Built with Vite and deployed on Vercel.
teamflow.modalContent: Manage teams with collaborative cards, dropdowns, and forms in a dynamic, responsive interface.

codeconnect.title: CodeConnect
codeconnect.description: A React project with dynamic components, state management, and hooks. Built with Vite for fast development.
codeconnect.modalContent: Create navigation, search, filters, and cards with dynamic React components and efficient state management.

codeconnect-login.title: CodeConnect Login
codeconnect-login.description: Login module for CodeConnect, showcasing reusable components and modular CSS styling.
codeconnect-login.modalContent: Build forms, inputs, and buttons dynamically using React components and state. Modular CSS ensures a clean, responsive layout.

dev-dragons.title: Dev Dragons
dev-dragons.description: RPG-themed app showcasing object-oriented principles like inheritance and dynamic rendering.
dev-dragons.modalContent: An RPG app with OOP concepts, dynamic character cards, and an interactive battle system.

codeconnect-post.title: CodeConnect Post
codeconnect-post.description: A web app for managing posts with dynamic forms and async features.
codeconnect-post.modalContent: Manage posts dynamically with image uploads, live previews, tag validation, and responsive forms.

fokus.title: Fokus
fokus.description: A Pomodoro timer with dynamic intervals, audio feedback, and interactive buttons.
fokus.modalContent: A minimalist Pomodoro timer with dynamic styles, responsive interface, and integrated audio feedback.

ifood.title: iFood Back-office Solution
ifood.description: A back-office solution for financial management, built with React and secure features.
ifood.modalContent: A project for iFood partners to manage digital transactions securely and efficiently.

about-games.title: About Games
about-games.description: A simple site for practicing HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap skills effectively.
about-games.modalContent: A practice project using HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap to improve layout and responsiveness.

mazzola-play.title: Mazzola's Play
mazzola-play.description: A basic webpage built using HTML, CSS, and responsive Flexbox layouts.
mazzola-play.modalContent: A simple webpage built as part of Flexbox learning with Alura, showcasing responsive designs.

fintech.title: FinPlus
fintech.description: A fintech landing page built using HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap components.
fintech.modalContent: A single-page fintech solution designed with responsive layouts and Bootstrap for front-end class.

alurabooks.title: AluraBooks
alurabooks.description: An e-commerce platform showcasing books with advanced JavaScript filtering and sorting.
alurabooks.modalContent: An advanced e-commerce site with JavaScript array methods for filtering, sorting, and responsiveness.

guess.title: Guess the Number
guess.description: A guessing game built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for practice.
guess.modalContent: An improved number guessing game featuring dynamic feedback and responsive design for fun interaction.

fiap.title: Associate Degree in Systems Analysis and Development
fiap.description: Pursuing an associate degree focused on developing technical skills in programming, software development, and systems analysis. This program provides a strong foundation for a career in technology and software engineering.

alura.title: Alura
alura.modalContent: Jogo de adivinhação melhorado com feedback dinâmico e design responsivo para uma interação divertida.

goldnet.title: Helpdesk IT
goldnet.description:
Goldnet TI is a leading IT services provider offering technical solutions for businesses.

As a Helpdesk IT, I was responsible for:

· On-site and remote technical support for system and equipment issues.
· Configuration, maintenance, and support of printers.
· Level 1 Help Desk support, assisting users with technical issues.
· Management of account creation, deletion, and permission adjustments in internal systems.
· First-line support, providing general user assistance.

evolution.title: Shuffler
evolution.description:
Evolution is a leading iGaming company renowned for delivering high-quality gaming experiences.

As a Shuffler, I was responsible for:

· Efficiently managing and shuffling cards to maintain the flow of the game.
· Ensuring uninterrupted and engaging gameplay for players.
· Contributing to an uninterrupted and immersive gaming experience.

vilaromana.title: Salesperson
vilaromana.description:
Vila Romana is a store specializing in business attire, including shirts, pants, suits, and accessories.

As a Salesperson, my responsibilities included:

· Assisting customers in selecting and purchasing business clothing and accessories.
· Providing detailed product information and recommendations based on customer needs.
· Developing strong communication skills and the ability to interact effectively with a diverse clientele.
· Maintaining store inventory and ensuring a high standard of customer service.

ambev.title: Apprentice
ambev.description:
Ambev is a major Brazilian brewing company with a presence in numerous countries.

As an Apprentice, my responsibilities included:

· Helping with the preparation of employee trainings and the analysis of the post results.
· Assisting the packaging area managers.
· Utilizing Microsoft Office Package Tools, such as Excel, for production control and factory training.

I started as an apprentice in Human Resources and was later relocated to Packing. I gained experience working in both the office and production/warehouse environments, developing the ability to interact with every level of the company, from factory workers to managers.

adoniroladeira.title: Apprentice
adoniroladeira.description:
Professor Adoniro Ladeira State School is an educational institution providing quality education to middle and high school students.

As an Apprentice, my responsibilities included:

· Assisting students from middle school and high school with their computer classes.
· Helping teachers in the preparation of presentations.

This experience allowed me to develop my passion for computers.
